quote.text: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.
quote.author: John

quote.text: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.
quote.author: John

quote.text: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: But now I go my way to him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?
quote.author: John

quote.text: But because I have said these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And when he is come, he will reprove the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:
quote.author: John

quote.text: Of sin, because they believe not on me;
quote.author: John

quote.text: Of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;
quote.author: John

quote.text: Of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.
quote.author: John

quote.text: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.
quote.author: John

quote.text: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: All things that the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he shall take of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?
quote.author: John

quote.text: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? we cannot tell what he saith.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do ye enquire among yourselves of that I said, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me?
quote.author: John

quote.text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.
quote.author: John

quote.text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
quote.author: John

quote.text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs: but the time cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs, but I shall shew you plainly of the Father.
quote.author: John

quote.text: At that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you:
quote.author: John

quote.text: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.
quote.author: John

quote.text: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.
quote.author: John

quote.text: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.
quote.author: John

quote.text: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?
quote.author: John

quote.text: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is now come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.
quote.author: John

quote.text: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
quote.author: John
